Akakiiko akanoonyereza ku by'ettaka kaateesa ebiteeso kkumi na mwenda.
Ebitongole eby'enjawulo ebiddukanya wamu n'okulabirira ettaka mu Uganda bigattibwe bibeere bibiri.
Bboodi z'eby'ettaka eza disitulikiti (District Land Boards) ziggyibwewo.
Obukiiko bw'eby'ettaka mu bitundu eby'enjawulo (Area Land Committees) buggyibwewo.
Emirimu gya District Land Boards n'egya Area Land Committees giweebwe ekitongole ky'eby'ettaka.
Wateekebwewo amateeka aganaayambako okutereeza engeri eby'ettaka gye bitambulamu.
Wabeerewo obwerufu mu kugonjoola ebizze bireetawo obutakwatagana mu by'ettaka okuva edda.
Okukendeeza ku bika by'ettaka okuva ku bina bifuuke bisatu.
Ebika by'ettaka ebirina okusigalawo mulimu; freehold, customary ne leasehold.
Ettaka lya gavumenti lyonna lifuuke lya freehold.
Gavumenti ewagire enteekateeka ey'okupunta n'okufuna ebyapa ku ttaka mu ggwanga lyonna.
Okufuna ebyapa kulina okuzingiramu n'ettaka lya customary okuyita mu land fund.
